books.title: Atomic Habits
books.author: James Clear
books.description: An easy & proven way to build good habits & break bad ones

chapters.title: The Surprising Power of Atomic Habits
content: Habits are the compound interest of self-improvement
Small changes seem insignificant but deliver remarkable results
Focus on systems rather than goals

chapters.title: How Your Habits Shape Your Identity
chapters.content: True behavior change is identity change. Every action is a vote for the type of person you wish to become.
